title: Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage Enters Sedona - Yahoo Finance
text:
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage, a leading residential real estate brokerage company in Arizona, today announced it has acquired the assets of Brearley Investment Company, Inc., which has been doing business as Coldwell Banker First Affiliate in two office locations in Sedona.
View photo
. Coldwell Banker First Affiliate was literally the first affiliate of the entire Coldwell Banker franchise system, signing on in 1982 as the first franchisee. Founded by co-owners Andrew and Patricia Brearley, Coldwell Banker First Affiliate, which has 75 independent sales associates, has been providing leading real estate services to the Sedona area for several decades and their legacy will continue forever under the Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage banner.
"Part of our growth strategy for major markets in Arizona is moving forward with this entrance into Sedona through the addition of this quality firm and its talented affiliated professionals," said Greg Hollman, president of Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage in Arizona. "Sedona is a marketplace where we have long aimed to have a presence, and Andrew Brearley and his team are known for their exceptional service."
Andrew Brearley will remain as manager of Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage's Sedona office, and Ron Volkman will continue as manager of the company's Village of Oak Creek office.
"I am very excited to be part of Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage and to know that our firm will be affiliated with the Coldwell Banker brand forever," said Andrew Brearley. "Our sales associates gain unequaled business development opportunities, the use of leading technology, extensive real estate services and an extremely powerful regional and international marketing platform. These advantages will enable them to better serve our valued customers, remain Sedona's top-selling brokerage and continue under the internationally recognized Coldwell Banker name."
With this acquisition, Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage now operates 25 offices with more than 1,400 independent sales associates throughout Arizona.
Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage in Arizona is the only full-service real estate company in the state of Arizona. It is owned by NRT LLC, which is the largest residential real estate brokerage in the United States. NRT operates the company-owned brokerage offices of Realogy Holdings Corp. ( RLGY ). For more information about Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage, visit www.coldwellbankerhomes.com .
